service.name: mapreduce_tasktracker_process_percent
service.label: Percent TaskTrackers Available
service.description: This alert is triggered if the number of down TaskTrackers in the cluster is greater than the configured critical threshold. It aggregates the results of TaskTrackers process checks.

JOBTRACKER.name: mapreduce_jobtracker_webui
JOBTRACKER.label: JobTracker Web UI
JOBTRACKER.description: This host-level alert is triggered if the JobTracker Web UI is unreachable.

JOBTRACKER.name: mapreduce_jobtracker_cpu
JOBTRACKER.label: JobTracker Host CPU Utilization
JOBTRACKER.description: This host-level alert is triggered if the percent of CPU utilization on the JobTracker exceeds the configured critical threshold.

JOBTRACKER.name: mapreduce_jobtracker_rpc_latency
JOBTRACKER.label: JobTracker RPC Latency
JOBTRACKER.description: This host-level alert is triggered if the JobTracker operations RPC latency exceeds the configured critical threshold. Typically an increase in the RPC processing time increases the RPC queue length, causing the average queue wait time to increase for operations.

ok.text: Average Queue Time:[{0}], Average Processing Time:[{1}]

warning.text: Average Queue Time:[{0}], Average Processing Time:[{1}]

critical.text: Average Queue Time:[{0}], Average Processing Time:[{1}]

JOBTRACKER.name: mapreduce_jobtracker_process
JOBTRACKER.label: JobTracker Process
JOBTRACKER.description: This host-level alert is triggered if the JobTracker process cannot be established to be up and listening on the network.

TASKTRACKER.name: mapreduce_tasktracker_process
TASKTRACKER.label: TaskTracker Process
TASKTRACKER.description: This host-level alert is triggered if the TaskTracker process cannot be established to be up and listening on the network.

TASKTRACKER.name: mapreduce_local_directory_space
TASKTRACKER.label: MapReduce Local Directory Space
TASKTRACKER.description: This host-level alert is triggered if the task tracker is reporting low disk space.

HISTORYSERVER.name: mapreduce_historyserver_webui
HISTORYSERVER.label: History Server Web UI
HISTORYSERVER.description: This host-level alert is triggered if the History Server Web UI is unreachable.
